archimate:DataObject.name: Backup Storage
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
Backup Storage
• Purpose: Data protection, long-term retention, and disaster recovery • Backup Types: Full backups, incremental backups, differential backups, snapshot backups • Storage: On-premises storage, cloud storage, hybrid solutions, tape storage • Retention: Legal requirements, regulatory compliance, business needs, cost optimization • Recovery: Recovery time objectives (RTO), recovery point objectives (RPO), testing procedures
